DOC.detailed_description: Intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) largely use treat male infertility . Usually , choice spermatozoon inject do 400x magnification . Recently , new microscopic technic ( Intracytoplasmic Morphologically Selected Sperm Injection-IMSI ) allow make choice 6000x magnification , permit identify sperm abnormality nuclear vacuole see conventional ICSI . This selection may improve ICSI outcome . However data randomise trial , publish indication IMSI remain identified . The present study aim evaluate efficiency indication IMSI multicentric randomise trial . The patient enrol study must present male infertility complete sperm examination , include morphology , DNA fragmentation nuclear immaturity . The main endpoint percentage delivery .
